entry.title: The World Is On the Move
entry.content: Across the globe, record numbers of migrants are seeking safety and economic opportunity—and prompting political backlash.

entry.title: Israel's 'Black Sabbath': Murder, Sexual Violence and Torture on Oct. 7
entry.content: Investigators build legal case documenting ‘systematic and unprecedented cruelty’ with echoes of Adolf Eichmann trial.

entry.title: Israel-Iran Tensions Rise as Israeli Forces Trade Fire With Militias in Syria, Lebanon
entry.content: Concerns are growing that a second front could open in the nearly three-month-old war between Israel and Hamas in Gaza.

entry.title: The Ruined Landscape of Gaza After Nearly Three Months of Bombing
entry.content: The destruction of homes, schools and other buildings resembles some of the most devastating campaigns in modern history.
